sentence: It is a conversation between Kevin McCarthy and Liz Cheney.
author: Lisa Desjardins
title: GOP's McCarthy and Greene are confronted by their own words after Jan. 6

sentence: Lisa Desjardins: And speaking of leaders, there was a tweet from another Republican, former lead member of leadership, Liz Cheney, who tweeted: "The GOP leadership has enabled white nationalism, white supremacy and antisemitism."
title: Tamara Keith and Amy Walter on the Buffalo shooting and the dangers of racist conspiracy theories
